verses.text: \w Like|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* hart which longs \w for|strong="H1121"\w* brooks \w of|strong="H1121"\w* water, \w I|strong="H1121"\w* long \w for|strong="H1121"\w* you, God.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w thirst|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* God, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w living|strong="H5315"\w* God. \w When|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* enter \w in|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* see \w the|strong="H5921"\w* face \w of|strong="H4325"\w* God?

\w My|strong="H7200"\w* tears \w have|strong="H7200"\w* been \w my|strong="H7200"\w* food \w by|strong="H6440"\w* day \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w by|strong="H6440"\w* night; \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w they|strong="H5315"\w* say \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* day \w long|strong="H4970"\w*, ‘Where \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* God?’

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* heart floods \w with|strong="H3117"\w* sorrow, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* call \w to|strong="H1961"\w* mind: how \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w used|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* throng, \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* head, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* house \w of|strong="H3117"\w* God, \w with|strong="H3117"\w* glad shouts \w and|strong="H3117"\w* giving \w of|strong="H3117"\w* thanks, \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* throng \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w kept|strong="H1961"\w* festival.

\w Why|strong="H5921"\w* am \w I|strong="H3588"\w* downcast? \w Why|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H5674"\w* moaning \w within|strong="H1004"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*? Hope \w in|strong="H5921"\w* God; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w praise|strong="H8426"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* help, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am sunk \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* misery; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w therefore|strong="H5921"\w* call \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w mind|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Jordan \w and|strong="H6440"\w* Hermon, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* mountain Mizar.

Flood \w is|strong="H5315"\w* calling \w to|strong="H5921"\w* flood \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* noise \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* cataracts; \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* waves \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* breakers \w have|strong="H2022"\w* passed \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* day \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w summon|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* kindness; \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* song \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* sing \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* night \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* prayer \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H3605"\w* God.

\w I|strong="H6680"\w* say \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* rock, ‘Why \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* forgotten \w me|strong="H5973"\w*? Why must \w I|strong="H6680"\w* walk \w so|strong="H6680"\w* sadly, \w so|strong="H6680"\w* hard pressed \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* foe?’

\w It|strong="H3212"\w* pierces \w me|strong="H7911"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* heart \w to|strong="H3212"\w* hear \w the|strong="H7911"\w* enemy’s taunts, as \w all|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* day \w long|strong="H4100"\w* \w they|strong="H4100"\w* say \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, ‘\w Where|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H7911"\w* God?’

Why am \w I|strong="H3117"\w* downcast? Why \w this|strong="H3117"\w* moaning within \w me|strong="H3117"\w*? Hope \w in|strong="H3117"\w* God; \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w yet|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* praise \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* help, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* God.
